TopicTitle: PE marker not in line with orbit line {[RESOLVED]}

Articles.Content:
So my PE marker is off a bit.... how do I fix this?    

LINK TO SCREENSHOT: https://imgur.com/Fl8d2vl

Edited August 11, 2018 by FlexT_ape
Edited thread title for clarity and removed bolded font
Did this happen in a modded game? If so, what mods do you have loaded?
Does it also happen on orbits that are in the same SOI?   Why might also need to see a bigger picture to have more context.

I had this happen on a flight out to Minmus a few weeks ago.

I'm a little hazy but, I think a restart of the game fixed it.
Sounds like a support issue. And so, moved to Support.

On 8/9/2018 at 7:47 PM, sumghai said:

Did this happen in a modded game? If so, what mods do you have loaded?

I didn't have any mods downloaded at that time. I do now though. The PE marker is on target now though. It worked after restarting a couple times and just playing for a bit.

Thanks all for the responses!
